rows.label: tev022201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about Defense Secretary Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Kirsty for further details on BLADE's responsibilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1061
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1081
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1091
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1101
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1121
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1141
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1151
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_SEL1161
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Defense Secretary Nagi is in charge of military affairs.
He, in turn, oversees Commander Vandham,
who serves as our operational leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0002
rows.name: It's mostly a political position, as I understand it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Normally someone in such a lofty position wouldn't
have contact with the boots on the ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0004
rows.name:
But Secretary Nagi always insists that he's just another
citizen of New LA, and strolls through the city without
an entourage. He's a very impressive leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0007
rows.name:
Why, are you offering to help? Because with the
amount of work on my plate, I won't turn you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hmmm... But if you don't even know the basics of
operating one of "those," I don't know how much
help you could be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well you should ask your patron—er, Elma, I mean—
to walk you through it. After that, we can talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Once you know what you're doing,
come back and talk to me, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0012
rows.name:
New LA is currently suffering from a chronic shortage
of raw materials. It's a problem that really needs to be
addressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ah, but you'll know your way around FrontierNav soon
enough. And when you do, maybe I can ask you to be
part of that solution?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0014
rows.name:
For now, just install as many data probes as you can,
and don't forget to put the techniques you were taught
to good use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thanks to you, we've been able to secure an abundant
supply of miranium, alleviating our resource problems
for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0030
rows.name: Please return to your normal duties with Elma's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0031
rows.name:
We'll put the resources you've gathered to the best
possible use in our ongoing efforts to expand New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0039
rows.name:
I don't know that there's anything I can teach you
at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0040
rows.name:
...Well, there may be one thing. You know how each
area has its own unique name, like the Grieving Plains
or the Silent Mire?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0041
rows.name:
Well, I bet you didn't know that the first BLADE who
discovers an area gets to name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0042
rows.name:
Therefore, the names of each locale are strongly
influenced by the nationality and cultural preferences
of the BLADEs that were first deployed there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'd love to have my name attached to a mighty river
or a scenic mountaintop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0044
rows.name:
But knowing my luck, I'd probably end up with a
swamp. Can you imagine it? Swamp Kirsty? ...Blech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0047
rows.name:
Now that we've secured all those resources you brought
us, we're trying to find a day to inspect and exchange
BLADE equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0048
rows.name:
We're inquiring into the availability of the teams from
each division so we can factor that into our schedule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0049
rows.name:
But honestly, it's quite the hassle. You BLADEs just seem
to go and do whatever you want without much regard
for scheduling![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Still, don't worry. You just keep focusing on your own
duties, and leave these sorts of details to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Have you heard about that miranium-for-money
exchange the Ma-non started up recently? They call it
the Shimmer & Savvy Financial Group, apparently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0066
rows.name:
I hear that if you fulfill their requests for miranium
posted on Mission Control, you can earn lots of credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0067
rows.name:
Perhaps you can take advantage of this opportunity
in order to build up a nice war chest?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0068
rows.name:
If you're interested, I believe the proprietor is on the
Ma-non ship. She should be able to fill you in
on the details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0076
rows.name:
FrontierNav was conceived as a modular exploration
system for uncharted planets. My companions and I
spent the last two years on the Whale developing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0077
rows.name:
But most importantly, it is a beacon of hope for
humanity's future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0078
rows.name:
Thanks to the efforts of talented BLADEs like yourself,
it has already accomplished more than we'd ever
hoped for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0079
rows.name:
You have my thanks. And I know my companions who
are slumbering in the Lifehold Core are grateful as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0080
rows.name:
Please keep planting those data probes until we know
everything there is to know about Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0083
rows.name:
There's apparently one Pathfinder who only uses
FrontierNav to advance his own interests and amass
his own personal fortune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0084
rows.name: His name is...Tobias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0085
rows.name:
It disgusts me to see such a selfish individual enriching
himself with something that was intended to bring hope
to humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0086
rows.name:
Please promise me that you will never become a BLADE
like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0101
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I haven't yet completed my analysis of the
data you brought me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0102
rows.name:
This must have been a project that was pursued in
secret—they used some pretty intense security to make
sure their superiors wouldn't find out about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0103
rows.name:
Grown adults behaving like kids... That's just the silly
kind of thing I expect them to do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0104
rows.name:
Still, it's probably because they were able to pursue
their research with such freedom that they were able
to complete FrontierNav in such a short time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0105
rows.name:
That snoop Tobias has been trying to find out what's in
the data you discovered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0106
rows.name:
Knowing him, he's probably wondering if it's something
he can use to make money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0107
rows.name:
Those plans represent the hopes and dreams of my
colleagues, and I won't have that man getting his
greedy hands on them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0108
rows.name:
So no matter what he asks, don't tell him anything.
Until I can crack the security, let's keep it a secret
between the two of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0109
rows.name:
We found the Lifehold Core in the nick of time.
Any longer, and our mimeosomes would have shut
down for good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0110
rows.name:
We owe it all to your heroic efforts that expanded
FrontierNav into enemy territory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0111
rows.name:
I just pray that everyone's original bodies are still safely
contained within the Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0112
rows.name:
If that's the case, we may even be able to reclaim the
lives of my team members whose mimeosomes were
scattered across the surface of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0113
rows.name:
Thank you for giving me the opportunity to share my
knowledge with a student like yourself. It was a great
joy for a teacher like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0114
rows.name:
Tobias has really started cooperating with me.
And it's not just for the money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0115
rows.name:
He's even staying up nights to design the necessary
infrastructure for the interplanetary network.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0116
rows.name:
The way things have been progressing, I'm starting to
believe that my team's pie-in-the-sky plans for a next-
generation FrontierNav might actually come to fruition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0117
rows.name:
To be clear, I'm talking about the far future here.
It won't happen overnight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022201_MSG0118
rows.name:
But one day, distant planets floating in space may be
part of the same FrontierNav as Mira.[ST:wait ]
